base_description: Rectangular, gray and blue, modern cabinet.
part_description: Features four rectangular compartments on top, a large blue panel with diagonal lines below, and two small knobs at the bottom right.
internal_interaction_description: The compartments provide storage space, while the blue panel acts as a decorative or functional door, hinged to open and close. The knobs facilitate easy opening of the panel, possibly revealing additional storage or functional elements inside.
external_interaction_description: Designed to interact with a room's decor, offering storage and aesthetic appeal. Users can access compartments and contents by opening the panel via knobs, integrating functionality with visual design.
